Question: Vuzix Corporation CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Vuzix Corporation

Product 1
- Vuzix Ultralite S AR smart glasses OEM design
- Aimed at sports and fitness users
- Hands-free, wireless connectivity to smartphone or smartwatch
- Vuzix Incognito technology virtually eliminates eyeglow
- Customizable in different styles, colors, and technology configurations

Product 2
- Vuzix Z100 Smart Glasses
- Designed for frontline workers
- Lightweight and comfortable all-day wearable solution
- Seamless integration with iOS and Android devices
- 640x480 monochrome green display
- MicroLED waveguide technology
- Wide 30° field of view
- Internal battery offers over two days of continuous usage
- Temple Touch tap sensor for effortless control
- Bluetooth Low Energy connectivity
